categories.title: Work Environment, Equipment and Hazardous Tasks

competencies.statement: I clearly understand my role and what is expected of me at work.
I feel that my role expectations are consistent and manageable.
competencies.response: my different responsibilities work well together.

competencies.statement: I feel that I am well-supported in my duty of care responsibilities.
competencies.response: I understand my duty of care to others.

competencies.statement: I feel that my task guidelines and boundaries are clearly defined.
competencies.response: I have clear boundaries for my tasks.

competencies.statement: I feel that my role expectations work well together.
I feel that my work tasks and standards are consistent and well-communicated.
I feel that my work is valuable and purposeful.
competencies.response: my tasks are meaningful and purposeful.

competencies.statement: I feel that I have opportunities to participate in decisions affecting my work.
competencies.response: I can participate in relevant decisions.

competencies.statement: I feel that I have control over my workload.
competencies.response: I have control over my workload.

competencies.statement: I feel that I can influence how I do my work.
competencies.response: I can set my own pace and schedule.

competencies.statement: I feel that my skills are fully utilised in my role.
I feel that my interactions with people at work are well-balanced.
competencies.response: I have balanced interactions with people.

competencies.statement: I feel that my workload is reasonable for my available time and resources.
competencies.response: my workload matches the time available.

competencies.statement: I feel that I can manage my various demands and deadlines.
I feel that the expectations of my competence are realistic.
I feel that my work tasks are sufficiently varied.
competencies.response: I experience good variety in my tasks.

competencies.statement: I feel that my work is meaningful and connects well together.
competencies.response: my tasks connect meaningfully to our goals.

competencies.statement: I feel that my required concentration levels are reasonable.
I feel that I am supported when dealing with difficult people at work.
competencies.response: I have support for challenging situations.

competencies.statement: I feel that I am protected from potentially traumatic situations.
competencies.response: I am protected from traumatic events.

competencies.statement: I feel that I receive adequate support during workplace changes.
competencies.response: I receive support during transition periods.

competencies.statement: I feel that my work environment has stable organisation.
I feel that I receive clear communication about workplace changes.
competencies.response: my input during changes is heard.

competencies.statement: I feel that I maintain good connections when working away from home.
competencies.response: I stay connected to my support network.

competencies.statement: I feel that I have opportunities for social interaction even when working alone.
I feel that I am safe and comfortable when working in private homes.
competencies.response: I feel safe in my working environment.

competencies.statement: I feel that my workload is well-balanced.
competencies.response: my workload is neither too heavy nor too light.

competencies.statement: I feel that I can manage my time pressures effectively.
I feel that I can manage my deadlines reasonably.
I feel that I can control my work pace.
competencies.response: I control my own work pace.

competencies.statement: I feel that my work has enough variety to keep me engaged.
I feel that my tasks are varied enough to maintain my interest.
competencies.response: my tasks are engaging and interesting.

competencies.statement: I feel that my work schedule is flexible and balanced.
I feel that I have flexibility in my work schedule.
competencies.response: my schedule has flexibility when needed.

competencies.statement: I feel that my working hours are predictable and manageable.
I feel that my working hours allow for a good work-life balance.
competencies.response: my hours are reasonable and family-friendly.

competencies.statement: I feel that my work aligns with meaningful objectives.
competencies.response: my tasks feel complete and worthwhile.

competencies.statement: I feel that I get reasonable time to complete my tasks.
competencies.response: I get reasonable notice to complete tasks.

competencies.statement: I feel that my work availability is consistent and predictable.
competencies.response: I know when I need to be available.

competencies.statement: I feel that my job is secure.
competencies.response: I feel secure in my role.

competencies.statement: I feel that my employment terms are stable and protected.
competencies.response: my pay and conditions are fair.

competencies.statement: I feel that my employment conditions are secure and clear.
I feel that I can communicate clearly with my team.
I feel that my workplace relationships are positive and supportive.
I feel that any conflicts in my workplace are resolved fairly.
I feel that I am safe from harassment and bullying at work.
competencies.response: I am safe from harmful behaviour.

competencies.statement: I feel that I can access support when I need it.
I feel that power dynamics in my workplace are fair.
I feel that I am included in my workplace community.
competencies.response: I feel socially and physically included.

competencies.statement: I feel that I understand my organisation's vision and goals.
competencies.response: our vision and objectives are clear.

competencies.statement: I feel that my managers' style suits our work.
competencies.response: the management style suits our needs.

competencies.statement: I feel that my feedback is listened to attentively.
I feel that I receive open and transparent information.
I feel that I receive adequate support from leadership.
I feel that I see accountability at all levels of my workplace.
I feel that decisions affecting me are fair and consistent.
I feel that decisions in my workplace are well-considered.
I feel that my leaders use their authority ethically.
I feel that my team communicates effectively.
I feel that I get support when solving problems.
I feel that I understand my organisation's objectives.
competencies.response: our objectives make sense to everyone.

competencies.statement: I feel that policies affecting me are applied fairly.
competencies.response: policies are applied fairly and consistently.

competencies.statement: I feel that my efforts are recognised appropriately.
I feel that my work contributions are valued.
I feel that I have opportunities to develop my career.
I feel that I receive adequate support from my supervisor.
I feel that I can access the support services I need.
I feel that I receive the training I need for my role.
I feel that I receive constructive feedback regularly.
I feel that my contributions are encouraged.
I feel that my supervisor communicates clearly with me.
I feel that I share in my organisation's vision.
I feel that I get support to improve my work.
competencies.response: I can access resources to improve my performance.

competencies.statement: I feel that my supervisor treats me fairly.
I feel that any monitoring of my work is appropriate.
I feel that I work in a trusting and respectful environment.
competencies.response: there is mutual trust and honesty.

competencies.statement: I feel that my workplace interactions are respectful.
competencies.response: interactions with others are respectful and considerate.

competencies.statement: I feel that my schedule allows for good work-life balance.
I feel that I can balance my work and home life.
I feel that I have enough time to recover after work.
I feel that I am safe from abuse at work.
I feel that I am safe from threats at work.
I feel that I am protected from assault at work.
I feel that I am safe from gender-based violence at work.
competencies.response: I am safe from gender-based harm.

competencies.statement: I feel that my racial identity is respected at work.
I feel that my gender identity is respected at work.
I feel that my religious beliefs are respected at work.
I feel that my sexual orientation is respected at work.
I feel that my workplace accommodates my needs.
I feel that my age is respected at work.
I feel that I am connected to my workplace community.
I feel that my assigned tasks have clear purpose.
I feel that I am free from insults at work.
I feel that my work is not undermined by others.
I feel that feedback about me is given constructively.
I feel that I receive the resources I need for my work.
competencies.response: I can access essential information and resources.

competencies.statement: I feel that I work in an environment free from harmful gossip.
competencies.response: I am safe from malicious rumours or gossiping.

competencies.statement: I feel that my deadlines are achievable.
competencies.response: my deadlines are realistic and achievable.

competencies.statement: I feel that my equipment is reliable and well-maintained.
competencies.response: my equipment is adequate and reliable.

competencies.statement: I feel that my working conditions are safe and suitable.
I feel that I have the tools I need to do my job.
competencies.response: I have the right tools for the job.

competencies.statement: I feel that my working conditions are safe.
competencies.response: I am protected from extreme conditions or situations.

competencies.statement: I feel that my work environment is stable and secure.
competencies.response: my environment is safe and stable.
